thread.title: Coronation Street spoilers: Obsessed Chloe makes her move on Peter
thread.title_full: Coronation Street spoilers: Obsessed Chloe makes her move on Peter

author: Jennifer Rodger
title: Coronation Street spoilers: Obsessed Chloe makes her move on Peter
text:
Chloe goes in for a kiss (Photo: ITV) Share Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
She’s on her fifth visit to Weatherfield, this time as Chloe, a divorcee who’s playing a wicked game with all Peter holds dear. 
Peter finds out the buyer for the Rovers is Chloe and orders her to stay away. Then, when Ken finds Chloe alone, she lies that she and Peter are having an affair and he’s back on the booze. Horrified, Ken seeks out Toyah – who is starting her IVF – to warn her. 
We catch up with Jo-Anne as she gets her teeth into the role – and the reformed Barlow bad boy... 
You first appeared on Corrie in 1995, as a nurse. Do you still feel like the new girl? 
It always feels that way. I still remember my first appearance standing on the street outside the factory, and I feel the same now. Jo-Anne has acted in all the soaps (Photo: ITV) Read More Coronation Street grooming storyline made me share the horror of being sexually abused by my stepdad 
Who do you share a dressing room with? 
I’m on my own! But one of my closest friends is Sally Ann Matthews, who plays Jenny. We’ve known each other since we were nine. I’ve also known Bev Callard (Liz McDonald) for 20 years. 
You’ve been in all the soaps, so which is the best? 
I think you probably know the answer to that! But in all seriousness, I’ve had a ball, and really enjoyed working with Chris Gascoyne (Peter Barlow). 
What makes Chloe turn into a ‘bunny boiler’ this week? 
She’s pretending to buy the Rovers, and he’s shocked to see her so close to home. He gets quite aggressive, warning her off, and it frightens and upsets her. She decides to fight fire with fire. 
Where will this storyline go? 
She uses everything he’s told her in confidence and sews it into a blatant lie that his family believe. She’s very clever. 
Does Peter deserve what’s coming? 
I think he’s led her on, but I’m not sure if Peter warrants the lengths Chloe goes to to mess up his life. 
Do you prepare for intimate scenes? 
We all have toothbrushes in our bags and pop to the toilet to brush our teeth! 
Is there any femme fatale in you? 
Oh gosh, no. I’m not like Chloe at all! I just go on walks with my Cockapoo, Mabel. Read More
